document.full_text: the euro fell on monday and stocks were weaker as the rise of a euro-skeptic party in finland added another potential hurdle to solving the euro zone's debt problems.
document.title: euro zone debt crisis gets new finnish threat
lines_and_colors: the euro fell on monday and stocks were weaker as the rise of a euro-skeptic party in finland added another potential hurdle to solving the euro zone's debt problems.
